name: Text
description: A wrapper for Text component with extra functionality like modifiers support

props.name: center
props.description: Whether to center the text (using textAlign)

props.name: uppercase
props.description: Whether to change the text to uppercase

props.name: highlightString
props.description: Substring to highlight. Can be a simple string or a HighlightStringProps object, or an array of the above

props.name: highlightStyle
props.description: Custom highlight style for highlight string
